title: Charisma
content:
Charisma Bards, paladins, sorcerers and warlocks use Charisma as their spellcasting ability - the likelihood spells will land.

Bards, paladins, sorcerers and warlocks use Charisma as their spellcasting ability - the likelihood spells will land.

Charisma is an Ability in Baldur's Gate 3. Each ability affects a broad range of capabilities, including skills or Spells that a character or a monster can be proficient in.
